alert.note: Alert for Iberville (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 7:20PM CDT until August 01 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Iberville Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 719 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ramah, or 15 miles west of Plaquemine, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rosedale, Grosse Tete and Ramah. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 128 and 139. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
